rukus.text: Magana vale ne saza magi, jihari (inakara karana vali'am te) vapara ke rahegi
Avagi'akari'am de la'i ko'i usa nu rokana vala nahim
Alaha valom jihara uce daraji'am da malaka hai
Usa vala farisate ate jibarila carha ke jande hana. Ika ajihe dina jisa da samam pajaha hazara sala de barabara hai
So tusim dhiraja rakho, vadhi'am dhiraja
Uha usa nu dura dekhade hana
Ate asim usa nu nere dekhade ham
Jisa dina asamana pighale ho'e tambe varaga ho javega
Ate pahara pijhi ho'i una di tar'ham
Ate ko'i mitara kise mitara nu nahim puchega
Uha unham (ika duje) nu vekha rahe honage. Aparadhi cahega ki kasa! Usa dina di afata tom bana la'i apane putaram
Apani patani ate apane bhara
ate apane parivara nu jihara usa nu sarana dena vala si
ate sapurana dharati vali'am nu aratha dada de ke apane apa nu mukata karava lave
Kade vi nahim, uha tam bharakadi ho'i aga di lapata hovegi
Jihari khala laha devegi
Uha hareka usa bade nu sadegi, jisa ne (sace dina tom) pitha ate muha mauri'a
Daulata ikathi kiti ate sainta ke rakhi
Nirasadeha! Manukha thorhe dila vala paida ho'i'a hai
Jadom usa nu kasata pahucada hai, tam uha ghabara uthada hai
Ate jadom usa nu khusahali miladi hai tam bari kajusi karana lagada hai
Ptu uha namaza parhana vale
Jihare apani namaza nu mariyada purabaka parhade hana
Ate jinham di puji vica (anatham da vi)
adhikara hai. Magana vali'am ate na magana vali'am da vi
Ate jihare inasafa de dina te visavasa rakhade hana
Ate jihare apane raba di saza tom darade hana
Besaka unham de raba di saza tom' kise nu lapravaha nahim hona cahida
Ate jihare apane gupata agam di rakhi'a karade hana
Paratu chuta apani'am patani'am tom jam apane adhikara adhina goli'am (vi'aha to' ba'ada) tom, unham kola jana tom ko'i manahi nahim
Para jihare bade isa tom binham kujha hora magana tam uha loka hadam da ulaghana karana vale hana
Ate jihare apani'am amanatam ate apani pratigi'a nu pura karade hana
Ate jihare apani'am gavahi'am te atala rahide hana
Ate jihare apani namaza di rakhi'a karade hana
Iha loka hi janata vica izata nala (dakhila) honage
